title: PM, Punjab CM discuss pace of development projects in province
content:
ISLAMABAD, March 9 (APP): Chief Minister Punjab Sardar Usman Buzdar called on Prime Minister Imran Khan here on Tuesday and discussed overall situation of the province.
The pace of ongoing development projects in Punjab also came under discussion.
